segments.text: What do you do in your spare times ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have many hobbies . I like almost all kind of sports , and I also like to listen to classical musics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What sports do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Football . It's a very exciting game , because it keeps you alert , and I also enjoying the team spirit of football .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I enjoying reading biographs , especially those of well-known statesmen , militarists and artists , I can learn a lot from their life histories .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the novels of Inches very much , I have reading almost all of them in Chinese translation , I wish i can reading them in the original .
segments.speaker: S2
